original_text:
For I hear the whispering of many—
    terror on every side!—
as they scheme together against me,
    as they plot to take my life.
korean_text: 내가 무리의 비방을 들었으므로 사방이 두려움으로 감싸였나이다 그들이 나를 치려고 함께 의논할 때에 내 생명을 빼앗기로 꾀하였나이다

sentences.original_text: For I hear the whispering of many
as they scheme together against me
as they plot to take my life.
